name: Bouncin Block
description:
This is my first game and thought id upload a almost demo version here before trying to add anything else to the game. if you want to get out you'll have to press alt F4, i haven't added a quit button yet. pls tell me how to improve and if you liked the idea in the comments.

The Aim of the game is to get to the platform/boxes in the least amount of jumps as possible.

Please can you say the amount of jumps in the comments so I can see the difference in peoples attempts.

controls

W - Forward

A - Left

S - Backwards

D - Right

Space - Jump

Use mouse to look
